de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.io
Class ACRResultWriter

java.lang.Object
  de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.io.ACRResultWriter

public class ACRResultWriter
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to write the feature dependent performance results for one specific classifier to an output file.

The output file contains the features and the values which must been matched by the CoreferencePairs to be considered for performance testing. Furthermore the results for each test file are printed as well as the overall result.

          Creates a new output file for the current ACR-System.

Constructor Detail

ACRResultWriter

public ACRResultWriter(java.lang.String runner,
                       Configuration config)
Creates a new output file for the current ACR-System.
The file will be named as follows: [ClassName]-[timeStamp].txt.
The path to the output file is specified by Configuration via the attribute "ResultOutputDir".

Parameters:
runner - The current ACR-System being evaluated.
config - The Configuration file which provides the output path.
Method Detail

writeFeatureFilters

public void writeFeatureFilters(Configuration config)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Writes the currently set feature selectors (determined by Configuration) and the desired values for the features to the file.

Parameters:
config - Config file which is used to get the feature selectors and their values.
Throws:
If - the feature selectors couldn't be written.
java.io.IOException

writeCorefResults

public void writeCorefResults(java.lang.String fileName,
                              java.util.List<CoreferencePair> tpList,
                              java.util.List<CoreferencePair> fnList,
                              java.util.List<CoreferencePair> fpList)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Writes the results for one specific MMAX-file.
Looks up the Configuration value for the key "PrintCorrect/WrongCorefPairs" to determine whether to also print each instance which has been determined correctly/which hasn't been classified by the ACR-System.

Parameters:
tpList - The list of true positive CoreferencePairs.
fnList - The list of false negative CoreferencePairs.
fpList - The list of false positive CoreferencePairs.
Throws:
If - the results couldn't be written.
java.io.IOException

writeOverallResult

public void writeOverallResult(Evaluation eval)
                        throws java.io.IOException
Writes the overall performance result.

Parameters:
eval - An Evaluation object which contains the performance data.
Throws:
If - the overall result couldn't be written.
java.io.IOException
